1111.title: Who can resist?

choices: A few weeks later, The couple entertains guests at a dinner
Whitestone is visited by a guest or two
11112.content:
I’m ready darling”

Lady Vex’Ahlia, baroness of the great hunt in Whitestone, leaned in to take a bite from the treat in her husband’s outstretched hands.

Warm pie filled her mouth, and she moaned.

She kept eating, biting into fresh dough and sweet cream filling.

It did not take long to finish.

“More.”

Percival Fredickstein von mussel klosowski the third decided to not give his wife a lesson on manners, but instead fulfilled her request. Next to their bed, was a table full of various sweets, normally enough to feed the entire castle of Whitestone, it would instead go into his as of now slim beloved wife.

This had been a long time coming for Vex. It was something she never admitted to anyone, not even her brother.

When she was a young girl she loved sweets, as rare as they were. Every harvest festival she would take all the sweets she could find and try to eat them all at once.

When her father took her to Syngorn, she saw something strange at the functions she was forced to attend. A beautiful and graceful elf started putting on weight. Following her one night, she saw her and her wife engaged in a nightly ritual that involved lots of sweets and lots of sex.

Soon after, the elf resigned from court as she had become immobile, and Vex knew what she wanted in life

It was hard, as an adventurer, to put on meaningful weight. Still, Vex would usually order seconds at dinner with Vox Machina, and steal off her friends plates when not looking. She would retreat to her room and cradle her stuffed belly, longing for more jiggle.

In Scanlans mansion, Vex would ask his servants to bring up as much Chicken to her room as possible, then quietly disposed of the remains in the morning.

But now, she had confessed to her husband her intentions to grow, and was surprised at just how enthusiastic he was. So they set aside this day to finally give the buxom black haired baroness what she always dreamed of.

Back in the present, Percy was now feeding the roguish ranger cookie after cookie, one at a time, loving the pout she would make when he went too slow.

After finishing the platter, Vex leaned back, and she and Percy both rubbed her engorged stomach.

“Where do you think this will end up, Dear?”

Percy cupped his wife’s breasts, and she giggled.

“Hopefully a fair bit will go here.”

“I’m sure some will go to my chest, you dog. But can you imagine me with a large belly, round ass, and chubby cheeks? Are you sure you’ll love me when I can’t fit out the door?

“Vex’ahlia, I would love you if you were the size of the castle.”

Vex laughed.

“Hopefully that won’t sound so ridiculous in a year or two.”

Vex ate as much of the meal as she could. And the next one. And the ones that came after. She was still never able to quite finish one, but she was getting better each time.
11112.title: Vex wishes to be wide

111121.content:
One night, The Lord and Lady were entertaining their guests for the evening. As was customary, they had a feast.

Percival was dressed to the nines, as usual, but lady Vex’Ahlia was simply dazzling in a deep blue dress with a very low cut. Had the guests seen her previously, they would have noticed the slight bulge of her stomach, or how her already generous chest had ever so slightly grown.

What the guests did notice was how much the Half Elven baroness was eating. Nothing was put on her plate that she didn’t plan to have a second helping of, at least.

And when dessert came out, a variety of puddings, pastries and cakes, they found it cute how Percy doted on his wife by feeding her with his fork many bites.

They also didn’t hear what lady Vex said to her husbands ear as the night was winding down, before making their way to their shared chambers.

“My dress is about to burst darling. I had some servants deliver food to the room.”
111121.title: Innocent hosts

1111212.content:
Vex awoke mid day in her luxurious bed. In addition to increasing her caloric intake to add mass to her body she was being lazy and lethargic, in part due to her preparing to one day be immobile.

She stretched her arms to wake up, and noticed how little her once loose nightgown now covered her belly. She started playing with her flab, mesmerized at how soft it was. She imagined how much bigger it would be in a year or two, and she could swear she could hear her heart racing.

She noticed her husband had left a tray of brownies next to her bed, along with a note that read “In my invention lab all day. I’m sure to enjoy the effects of these tonight.”

Vex smiled, wondering how she found the perfect man.

As Vex dug into the fattening treats, she admired her mirror. It showed the previously lithe half elf bulging out of her clothes. Her aforementioned stomach was a beautiful pot belly, which produced squishy love handles.
Spending more time on her ass had caused her to not be able to fit some of her favorite pants over her bulky thighs.
And Percival did indeed enjoy her inflated breasts at night.

And finally, even without being stuffed with gooey chocolate goodness as they are now, there would be no denying her rosy cheeks would have a chipmunk like quality about them, that went perfectly well with her developing double chin.

All in all, Vex was around 60 pounds closer to her lifelong dream.

1111212211.content:
As Allura Vysoren completed the teleportation circle, she strained against the girdle she was wearing.

Fixing the tal’dorei council was rough on the arcanist, leading to many restless nights kept awake only by the sweets her wife makes. It was only a few pounds, but Allura would be mortified if anyone saw her growing pot belly.

The blonde stepped into the portal, planning on a visit to Percy and Vex in Whitestone. When she got there she saw...
1111212211.title: She’s put on a couple

11112122113.content:
Allura watched as a group of servants rushed past her, only one acknowledging her presence with a “hello!” They were pushing a large tray full of who knows what. Curious, Allura followed them. They reached a large set of double doors, above which was spelled “Lord and Ladies room.” How odd she thought. She didn’t remember their quarters being on the ground floor.

As the doors opened she could hear the voice of Vex say “ Ah yes wonderful darlings, put it *munch* with the rest of the dessert over there!”

Allura stepped into the room and gasped. She saw Vex, she had to be...

choices: Allura is convinced to gain more weight by Vex
Allura is turned on watching vex gorge
111121221131.content:
Vex was propped up on her bed, large stomach pooling in front of her. She was dressed in a purple nightgown that covered her head sized tits, but not much else. Her long raven hair was styled into her ponytail trailing behind her. When she saw the tray of desserts being brought to her she clapped her hammy arms together, causing her to jiggle from her engorged calves to her chubby cheeks.

She was mid bite of a turkey leg when she finally saw Allura.

“Allura! How are you darling!”

“Good... how are you?” She asked with uncertainty.

“Oh wonderful. I’m so fat!”

“You, like this?”

“Of course I do. And I must say I appreciate you putting on some too!”

Allura blushed and covered her modest pot belly.

“Well I’m glad your happy at least.”

Vex took a big bite of a slice of chocolate cake.

“Oh me and Percy have never been happier! Oh, and he shows me how happy he is all night long, if you catch my drift. Anyway I’m glad your here! Let me get dressed and we can go to the first dinner of the evening!”

Allura sighed. Depending on how long she stayed here, she would probably need to up her dress sizes. Again.
111121221131.title: 300 pounds

choices: What if? Vex and Allura begin an affair
1111212211311.content:
Later that night, Vex and Allura were eating dinner. Despite numerous platters being brought in, Allura was surprised to learn that only they would be dining.

"Where is Percy?" Allura asked.

"Off in Vasselheim, looking into securing more gunpowder for his projects." Vex replied before greedily digging in to her sea food dinner.

After a while, Vex spoke up.

"Eat up dear. Don't waste any calories!"

"I am concerned about how... eager you are about all of this..."

"Fat? Why shouldn't i be?"

" There are some who would find it... unsightly."

Vex laughed, the laugh cascading down her vast belly and causing it to shake.

"Why should i care what others deem 'unsightly' when i am the happiest I've been in ages!"

Allura went to argue, but stopped herself.

"Come now Allura darling. you must admit that the pounds look good on me. And by extension you."

Allura considered it for a moment. vex was one of the most stunning women she knew, second only to her wife. And a few hundred pounds certainly hadn't diminished that. Maybe she was on to something?

"Vex, when's dessert arriving?"

Vex simply smiled.

"Whenever you want, darling."
1111212211311.title: Allura is convinced to gain more weight by Vex

choices: Percy returns and makes up for lost time
11112122113112.content:
A few weeks after Allura went on her way, new curves bursting out of her blue dress, Vex waddled around doing her duties as a noble of Whitestone.

Well as much as an obese waddling noble could do. Which wasn't much.

She oversaw the new expansions being built to the castle, only some of which were related to her own future expansions.

While Whitestone had no ruler anymore, some of the townsfolk looked to her as a queen of sorts, and she would hear pleas for help and try to assist when she could.

Lastly, she wrote several letters to be addressed to foreign dignitaries. It was a hassle and a half writing when half the desk is taken up by your large gut, so she usually had someone scribe the letters for her.

Of course between all these events she had 3 breakfasts, 4 lunches, and a verifiable feast for dinner, not to mention the cavalcade of cookies, pastries, and other deliciously fattening sweets she had consumed that day.

You could understand why she was exhausted as she lumbered towards the common room that evening.

"Oh. The only thing that would have made this day better would be if my husband was here to feed me, and placate other desires i have.

Vex had commissioned a grand oak chair to sit in front of the fire place back in her thinner days, trimmed with very soft fur that you could melt into. She had asked for it to be made much wider than her previously bony bum, perhaps sub consciously hoping she would fill it one day, so she could still fit into it even now, mostly.

Vex lumbered herself into her chair, taking note of how her fat pooled over the sides

creak

She wondered about how she was lucky trade with Emon was booming, or else they wouldn't be able to keep her this well fed.

creak

That pie was delicious today. Even though her fifth chef had only started a few weeks ago she considered giving them a raise.

creak

Before she could think her next thought, the chair broke under her, perfectly splitting down the middle. Either through sheer luck or having a tougher skin than her doughy form would seem, she suffered no splinters in her wonderfully wide behind.

Deep in her heart, she felt the tinge of sadness at the thought of losing her favorite chair, but it was covered and smothered by another thought.

"Holy shit I'm too fat for our sturdiest chair!"

Guards rushed in at the sound of crashing, finding their lady sitting in a pile of tinder, and helping the blushing half elf to her feet, something that required both of them to pull with all their might.

After she dusted herself off and headed for her bed chambers, she had another thought.

"Wait till Percy hears about this."
11112122113112.title: Vex breaks her favorite chair

111121221131121.content:
Shortly after her incident with the chair, Percy finally returned with several wagons of gunpowder.

He was delighted to hear about his wife's escapades in his absence. He did feel guilty about neglecting his wife for all this time, so he doubled his feeding of her.

They celebrated 400 pounds with a large cake and lots of sex.

Vex was now even less mobile, but she still had the burning in her heart that demanded she grow even further. Percy happily obliged. A sixth and seventh cook was hired in this time.

one day, Percy came back to their bedchamber to find an alluring sight. It was his wife, wearing only the sheerest see through nightgown, stuck in their doorway, chubby face shaded pink in a mix of embarrassment and arousal. On full display were her melon sized breasts, perched on top of a majestically fat stomach.

"Darling, I appear to be... stuck."

"Yes, you do appear stuck."

"Please help, before anyone sees me!"

"Oh i will. But this is too good an opportunity to pass up." He said, already unbuckling his belt. Vex just grinned.

Any staff that walked by heard the tell tale sounds of love making echoing the hall and gave them a wide berth.

Afterwards, husband and wife were both panting.

"I know you will want to expand the doors so this doesn't happen to me again, but maybe we should keep some the same size so we can repeat this experience, darling."

"Oh i agree. no lets get you out of there."

It took a good five minutes to free Vex from the doorway. When she popped out, they both lost their balance and Vex collapsed on top of her husband.

"Oh. Sorry Percy. Now that I'm here however, with my weight on top, i could go for another-"

She stopped when she noticed that Percy was turning red, then purple.

She rolled off of him, and immediately began making it up to him with a big kiss on his cheek.
111121221131121.title: Percy returns and makes up for lost time

choices: Fayra sets off a fashion revolution
1111212211311211.content:
They celebrated 600 pounds with several large cakes and even more sex.

After careful consideration, the feedee/feeder couple decided they wanted a threesome.

Not wanting to ignite drama with their companions in Vox Machina, they decided a courtesan was the best choice.

Shopping around, they decided on a high class escort from Emon.

She showed up in a carriage, her name was Fayra Deen, an air genasi as noted by her sky blue skin and wispy white hair. She made her way up to the castle. She was greeted by a man with white hair.

"Hello, I am Percival De Rolo. My wife is... occupied at the moment. She's waiting in our bed chambers preparing for tonight."

Fayra nodded, and accompanied Percy. As she walked through the halls she noticed a few paintings of Percy and a gorgeous raven haired elf. She could of sworn the woman looked softer in some of the paintings.

Percy opened up a door that looked recently renovated and showed Fayra in.

"Oh wow. Your beauty was not embellished!"

Fayra was stunned by the person who just spoke.

Lounging on a bed, fully nude, was one of the fattest women Fayra had ever seen. Her eyes were a squint, due to the large amount of fat packed on to her face. A triple chin led down to extremely large breasts, with saucer like nipples.
The rest of her body was hidden by the gelatinous mass that was this woman's stomach.

Somehow, she was the hottest woman Fayra had ever seen as well.

She turned to the undressing Percy.

"How... will this work?"

"We discussed this. I have a pulley to reach her sensitive areas, but that seemed... crass, for such a person as yourself. So, for our first act of the night, care to join me on top of my wife?"

Wordlessly they both climbed on top of the giggling jubilant woman, finding her skin to be even more soft and supple than what it appeared to be. As Fayra turned to Percy, he had a cookie in his hand and held it to her face.

'Sorry. Its tradition."

She accepted the cookie, and much more, as Percy repeatedly stuffed her, in both senses of the word.

All the while Vex cooed and moaned, seemingly attuned to the arousement of the couple using her as a bed to have sex on.

Afterwards, Percy held aloft his wife's stomach so Fayra could show her other talents down below, bringing her to a number of satisfying conclusions.

Fayra had sex with the nearly immobile, according to Percy, woman in nearly every position she could think of. The highlight was definitely when Vex lowered her weight slowly onto Fayra as percy took his wife from behind.

When Fayra left a few days later, she clutched an overstuffed stomach, and had already decided to talk her manager into allowing her to change her diet a little.
1111212211311211.title: Vex reaches 600 pounds

11112122113112111.content:
Luckily they were together when it happened.

Vex awoke one morning, vision partially obscured by her cheeks. Percy was resting on top of his 734 pound wife. He got up, kissed her cheek, and began getting dressed.

At this size, Vex could only get up every other day or so. The other day she had reached the door before she was forced to return, lest she collapse in an uncomfortable place.

Vex summoned her strength, but she didn't move.

She tried again, with the same result.

"Percy..." she said.

Instantly her husband was by her side, understanding what she wanted based on the tone of her voice. He grabbed her reaching arms and tried to pull with all his might, to no avail.

Vex started breathing heavily, and not from exertion.

"I...I'm t-too fat to move! I've eaten my way to where i've always wanted!"

"I'm so proud of you dear. And to be honest, I have to be proud of myself too."

"Just shut up and fuck your immobile wife, you bastard."

As she lied there with he rhusband, Vex reflected on the journey she had. Confessing to Percy, the first dozen pounds, convincing Allura to gain, breaking her chair and getting stuck in the doorway, and the threesome with Fayra.

it was everything she wanted, and so much more.

And she would keep adding more and more

(This is the initial end point of this story, but i want to keep it open for me or anyone else to add to)

11122.content:
“What’s this?”

“Pudding.”

“And this over here?”

“Pie.”

“I had no idea there were so many foods!”

Keyleth of the Air Ashari was new to living in the “downstairs” world. A child of the air ashari, the half elven woman was known for her naïveté, and beauty.

Long fiery red hair flowed past her sun kissed face. She was dressed in a light green tunic that while modest, did show off her rather flawless figure.

“How much?”

“For what?”

“Uhhh… one of each?”

Vox Machina was in the city of Emon, and the group was in the middle class of a shopping spree. Most were either at Gilmores or buying weapons, but Keyleth and Vex headed to a pastry shop.
“25 gold.”

“Vex? Can we?”

The Druid turned to her fellow half elf, raven haired Vex’Ahlia, who was waiting patiently by the door.

“Fine darling. But we are sharing this with the group. Don’t want you to, you know…”

“What?” Replied Keyleth.

“Keyleth, you know…”

The ranger tried to search for the right way to say this. She blew out her cheeks. When the Druid still looked confused, she said.

“Get Fat.”

“What does that mean?”

“Oh dear.”

Vex sighed and rubbed her temples.

“Darling, when someone eats more than they should, they get… heavier.”

“And that’s a bad thing?”

“Well, to some. I’ve heard there are those that rather enjoy being… bigger. Now let’s pay and move along.”

After paying the baker, the two half elves took their bounty back to Greyskull keep, but keyleths mind was racing.

Heavier

Bigger

Keyleth had heard of those words before, obviously. And in her travels they had come across some heavyset individuals. But the idea of becoming that heavyset was … exciting to her? Such a new experience.

She might have to explore this at some point
11122.title: New foods New experiences

Keyleth took to eating like a duck to water.

Vox Machina was on an extended holiday in Emon, and each of the party members were left to their own devices.

Keyleth was now a frequent customer at that bakery, buying all manners of treats.

She has noticed she has gained, and the feeling is electrifying to her.

How long has it been?

1112221.content:
Keyleth has just finished the latest of her recent binges. She rubbed her bloated belly with a smile of contentment. She had only just started down this journey and was already seeing results in the form of her abdomen softening from her once, lean,, fit physique, to one that looked big and doughy. She looked at herself in the mirror and began to notice that some other parts of her were getting fatter, as well.

Her thighs seem to be getting bigger and rounded as the gap between them started getting smaller. Her chest began to make her makeshift bra tight as it was getting a little uncomfortable for the twins. Her ass was one the one part of the gain that surprised her. She never knew that with every bite she ate her ass would swell in size now making its self known unlike its formerly flat shape. “I guess Vex isn’t the only one with curves anymore.” She smiled, excited as she walked into town to pick up some more delectable treats for her belly to eat later.

Where should she go? Sweet desserts to make her savor her gains slowly, or greasy foods that’ll make her gain as fast as Vax can run.

1112223.content:
Keyleth groaned as she reached over to her nightstand, where a fresh batch of trays waited for her.

Ever since that faithful day, Keyleth let her appetite guide her, and guide her it had.

Keyleths thighs spread out like marshmallows behind her. For once she was bustier than Vex. Whenever she looked down a double chin would appear on her adorably chubby cheeks.

But her gut was her favorite.

A small boulder of flab on her torso was all hers to massage and shake, which was just beginning to split into a second roll.

Keyleth picked up a bear claw and devoured it. She moaned in sugary delight.

“More.” She said to no one but herself. God she loved that word. More food meant more her.

Then there was a knock at the door.
“Keyleth? It’s Vex.” Said the door.

Keyleth quickly put another bear claw in her mouth and spoke with her mouth full.

“C-come in.”

1213313.content:
Yasha groaned as she brought the fork to her lips. It was a bit harder to do this time. Despite being stuffed well past the normal limit, she craved more.

The Meighty nein were stumped. One day in Nicodranas their friend decided to eat at the lavish chateaus buffet well past her limit and they laughed it off. But she kept doing it. Weeks turned to months. The seasons passed. Yasha took every opportunity to devour whatever was placed in front of her. Dwendalian delicacies, Xhorhasian delights, even when they killed a mammoth in Eiselcross.

She began neglecting her usual workouts, then stopping them entirely. Fat began to develop , covering the pale woman’s ungodly sturdy abs. They all thought “surely she’ll realize and stop eating so much.” If anything, she doubled down. She would interrupt crucial meetings by either crunching something or her belly roaring, and recently had been interrupting meetings by creaking or crashing her chair. In combat she would still pull her weight( or as much of it as she could) by letting the enemy come to her and bringing skin gorger down on them. But travel was extra hard on her now, and she requires constant breaks.

Caleb cast all manner of spells to see if this was some curse placed on her by their enemies, but found nothing. The Nein all had a meeting and decided Yasha would stay behind at the Xhorhaus from now on, to which she only asked “will there be people giving her food?”

Currently she is...
1213313.title: A whole lot

choices: Yasha is summoned by the bright queen
12133131.content:
As she waddled from the kitchen to her couch, Yasha couldn’t help but be pleased with how fat she had gotten. Years of not knowing who she was were at ease.

Gaining weight wasn’t her intention, it was merely a side effect of her newfound appetite. An appetite that had been built up for years.

How could her friends understand that this was freedom to her? As she brought the sandwich to her lips she went over what she saw in the mirror in front of her.

Even when not full of food her cheeks were puffy. When she smiled she could clearly see the adorable double chin she had developed.

Below, her previously modest breasts had likewise grown modestly. They were fun to jiggle and play around with, but not nearly as fun as below them.

A gargantuan, massive gut was the first thing people saw of Yasha, before the black and white hair or the tattoos. Half of her body weight had to be in this thing, and it was perfect to rest things on or jiggle.

Yasha thighs had also seen a bit of weight, giving her an apple styled body. She had seen Beau blush at the sight of her tush when she left the hot tub, and was looking forward to the monk taking a more in depth look soon.

Yasha cooed as she finished her sandwich. Her stomach looked even rounder then before, and she ran her fingers over the pale flesh.

This was all her, and hopefully soon there would be more.

info.brief_description: The lovely ladies of Exandria find themselves packing on the pounds
info.description:
The girls of Vox Machina and the mighty Nein start packing on the pounds! The rules are as follows:

Female weight gain ONLY
ALL CHARACTERS 18 AND UP
No vore, scat, or other toilet stuff
Try to write more than one paragraph please.
